title: Zar Amir Ebrahimi
summary:
Zahra Amir Ebrahimi (Persian: زهرا اميرابراهيمی; born July 9, 1981) known professionally as Zar Amir Ebrahimi (زر امیرابراهیمی), is an Iranian-French actress, producer and director. She rose to international prominence for her performance as journalist Arezoo Rahimi in the crime thriller Holy Spider (2022), for which she won the Cannes Film Festival Award for Best Actress and Robert Award for Best Actress.
Amir Ebrahimi is also a producer and host for the BBC and oversees a cultural program for the Persian branch of BBC World.
In 2022, she appeared on BBC's 100 Women list as one of the world's inspiring and influential women of the year.
